Das AQQAsystem basiert auf der Idee des: The AQQAsystem is based on the idea of the AQQAbag, but is modularly scalable. This means it can be perfectly adapted to any site. Suitable for projects with very high water requirements.
Der AQQAcube vereint die Vorteile von AQ: The AQQAcube combines the advantages of AQQAbag and AQQAsystem. With a weight of 30kg it is very mobile and filters 1200 liters of drinking water in 24 hours.

Um kurzfristig den Bedarf an Trinkwasser: To cover the short-term demand for drinking water, the AQQAbag can supply a person with at least 4 liters of drinking water per day for half a year.
